name: Cheri-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is paralyzed, it consumes this item to cure the paralysis.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures paralysis.

name: Chesto-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is asleep, it consumes this item to wake up.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures sleep.

name: Pecha-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is poisoned, it consumes this item to cure the poison.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures poison.

name: Rawst-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is burned, it consumes this item to cure the burn.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures a burn.

name: Aspear-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is frozen, it consumes this item to thaw itself.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures freezing.

name: Leppa-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is out of PP for one of its moves, it consumes this item to restore 10 of that move's PP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 PP for a selected move.

name: Oran-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 10 HP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 10 HP.

name: Persim-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is confused, it consumes this item to cure the confusion.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures confusion.

name: Lum-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is afflicted with a major status ailment, it consumes this item to cure the ailment.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures any major status ailment.

name: Sitrus-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/4 its max HP.

Used on a party Pokémon
:   Restores 1/4 the Pokémon's max HP.

name: Figy-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes spicy flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Attack), it will also become confused.

name: Wiki-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes dry flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Special Attack), it will also become confused.

name: Mago-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes sweet flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Speed), it will also become confused.

name: Aguav-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes bitter flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Special Defense), it will also become confused.

name: Iapapa-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes sour flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Defense), it will also become confused.

name: Liechi-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Attack by one stage.

name: Ganlon-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Defense by one stage.

name: Salac-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Speed by one stage.

name: Petaya-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Special Attack by one stage.

name: Apicot-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Special Defense by one stage.

name: Lansat-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its critical hit chance by one stage.

name: Starf-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise a random stat by two stages.

name: Enigma-berry
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder takes super-effective damage, it consumes this item to restore 1/4 its max HP.

name: Bright-powder
description:
Held in battle
:   Moves targeting the holder have 0.9× chance to hit.

name: White-herb
description:
Held in battle
:   At the end of each turn, if any of the holder's stats have a negative stat modifier, the holder consumes this item to remove the modifiers from those stats.

name: Quick-claw
description:
Held in battle
:   Whenever the holder attempts to use a move, it has a 3/16 chance to act first among moves with the same priority.  If multiple Pokémon have this effect at the same time, Speed is the tie-breaker as normal, but the effect of trick room is ignored.

name: Mental-herb
description:
Held in battle
:   When the holder is attracted, it consumes this item to cure the attraction.

name: Choice-band
description:
Held in battle
:   Holder has 1.5× its Attack.  When the holder attempts to use a move, all its other moves are disabled until it leaves battle or loses this item.

    The restriction ends even if this item is swapped for another Choice item
via trick or switcheroo.

name: Kings-rock
description:
Held in battle
:   Holder's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make their target flinch.  This chance applies independently to each hit of a multi-hit move.

    This item's chance is rolled independently of any other move effects;
e.g., a move with a 30% chance to flinch normally will have a 37% total chance to flinch when used with this item, because 3% of the time, both effects activate.

Held by poliwhirl or slowbro
:   Holder evolves into politoed or slowking, respectively, when traded.

name: Silver-powder
description:
Held in battle
:   Holder's bug-type moves have 1.2× their power.

name: Soul-dew
description: Held by Latias or Latios: Increases the holder's Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.

name: Deep-sea-tooth
description: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder's Special Attack.  Evolves the holder into Huntail when traded.

name: Deep-sea-scale
description: Held by Clamperl: Doubles the holder's Special Defense.  Evolves the holder into Gorebyss when traded.

name: Focus-band
description: Held: If the holder is attacked for regular damage that would faint it, this item has a 10% chance to prevent the holder's HP from lowering below 1.

name: Scope-lens
description: Held: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 1.

name: Metal-coat
description:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Steel moves by 20%.
Held by Onix or Scyther: Evolves the holder into Steelix or Scizor when traded, respectively.

name: Leftovers
description: Held: Heals the holder by 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn.

name: Light-ball
description: Held by Pikachu: Doubles the holder's initial Attack and Special Attack.

name: Soft-sand
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Ground moves by 20%.

name: Hard-stone
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Rock moves by 20%.

name: Miracle-seed
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Grass moves by 20%.

name: Black-glasses
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Dark moves by 20%.

name: Black-belt
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Fighting moves by 20%.

name: Magnet
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Electric moves by 20%.

name: Mystic-water
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Water moves by 20%.

name: Sharp-beak
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Flying moves by 20%.

name: Poison-barb
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Poison moves by 20%.

name: Never-melt-ice
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Ice moves by 20%.

name: Spell-tag
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Ghost moves by 20%.

name: Twisted-spoon
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Psychic moves by 20%.

name: Charcoal
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Fire moves by 20%.

name: Dragon-fang
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Dragon moves by 20%.

name: Silk-scarf
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Normal moves by 20%.

name: Up-grade
description: Held by Porygon: Evolves the holder into Porygon2 when traded.

name: Shell-bell
description: Held: Heals the holder by 1/8 of any damage it inflicts.

name: Sea-incense
description: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Water moves by 20%.

name: Lax-incense
description: Held: Increases the holder's Evasion by 5%.

name: Lucky-punch
description: Held by Chansey: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 2.

name: Metal-powder
description: Held by Ditto: Increases the holder's initial Defense and Special Defense by 50%.

name: Thick-club
description: Held by Cubone or Marowak: Doubles the holder's Attack.

name: Stick
description: Held by Farfetch'd: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 2.

name: Red-scarf
description: Held: Increases the holder's Coolness during a Super Contest's Visual Competition.
